long_description: Designed to protect you from harmful UV rays, the REI Sahara Hat for women has UPF protection and a wide brim to shade your face during a day spent playing outdoors. With a UPF 50+ rating, nylon fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Wide brim provides ample sun protection and has a foam insert to help the hat retain its shape; plus, it floats! Polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. The REI Sahara Hat has a chin strap to secure the hat when the wind picks up.
short_description: Designed to protect you from harmful UV rays, the REI Sahara Hat for women has UPF protection and a wide brim to shade your face during a day spent playing outdoors.
